_sText:
Map made across the week, thanks to Pcpie for solving my problems when I had them. Happens quite often.

I made most of the map on stream (http://twitch.tv/dreeeaam), check out some of the past broadcasts if you are that interested in watching me make this. I plan to do more streams with more maps for the future but my internet is not stable so the viewers do not have much enjoyment from it.

NOTE: the start is where you spawn, when you reach the "go back" section, you turn around and go back through the map a little. Just trying to experiment with some new gameplay that has been used a lot recently.

I will try and make my next map textured, I have been trying a  lot recently to use realistic textures but my style of mapping just makes it really difficult for me.
